title: How to record on FL Studio 20 - Quora

response.answer_text: Make sure your FL Studio version is at least the $200 Producer Edition or you won’t be able to record at all. You want to first assign your microphone to a track in your mixer. To do this, go to your mixer and select a track that is NOT your master track. In the part of the track that contains your plugins, look for the input tab and select a mono input(mono just means one microphone in this case). Now it should say something like “Input 1” or something similar. After this, just arm the track that you assigned the microphone to and then arm to record(it’s to the right of the stop button). Now when you have the project armed to record, it will always record your armed tracks.
